classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Library or Lesser General Public License (LGPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Application Frameworks
info.name: fgr
info.summary: Zero-dependency Python framework for object oriented development.

vulnerabilities.details:
### Impact
Any users whom would not desire a traceback to be included in their logs whenever an error is raised in their code will be affected.

If users have inadvertently created a scenario in their code that could cause a traceback to include sensitive information _and_ a malicious entity gained access to their log stream, this could create an issue.

### Patches
None yet... users will need to upgrade to `0.4.*`

### Workarounds
No particularly reasonable ones at present.

### References
* https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/453.html
* https://www.invicti.com/web-vulnerability-scanner/vulnerabilities/stack-trace-disclosure-python/
